page.title: 06WILDLIFE.
page.content: OUR SECOND DOMESDAY BLOCK. We went down Newball Lane and we saw two ducks which were Mallards.You can tell which is a male or a female duck because a male has darker feathers than a female.We saw them together.We also saw a pheasant on the road and Helen saw a hedgehog on the side of the road.We also saw a Yellow Hammer on the fence which when it saw us flew away and that is when we noticed it.You can tell it is a Yellow Hammer because it has a yellow tummy.We saw a field with lots of blackbirds in it.In one forest there were all sorts of trees and when I looked I saw some Christmas trees.We also saw some Oak trees.We saw a pheasant climbing into a sugar-beet field.We went past the place where Mr.Diprose keeps his bees and pheasants.
